title: Can you help to identify this font, please
content:
Good morning, could you please help telling me the name of the font below?  
It may be slightly distorted since the image comes from a photo of this  
wordmark printed on paper bag.  
Thank you for your help.
author: DumbType

comments.content: Considering /Q tail as "wavy", I'd say [Arial](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426051524/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/arial). If not, could be [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426051524/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/helvetica).

Thank you so much, Ryuk.  
I did check it and compare it with most on my fonts but don't know why I skipped Arial when comparing; which is the one. Sorry about wasting your time. I'll be more careful next time.  
Thanks again for your help.
